item.title: Alfaomega v1.7.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 26, 2025

Alfaomega v1.7.1 ETS2

Alfaomega is a fictional island.
The map is in a 1:1 scale and operates on a separate module.
Currently this map contains 48 cities and many kilometers of roads to explore.

Version 1.7.1 (for ETS2 1.55.x)
– refreshed road No.2 between Beta & Kappa
– refreshed road No.3 between Omega & Sigma
– refreshed roads No.30 and No.31
– refreshed road No.313

Credits: Ommega

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Road Network v1.3 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 26, 2025

The Godfather’s Road Network v1.3 ATS

The Godfather’s ATS Road Network

The Godfather’s Mods Company Brings to you American Truck Simulator’s Ultimate Traffic & Freight Market Jobs Mod Pack that spawns at random into the Traffic Flow & Freight Market Jobs & World Of Trucks Freight Market Jobs and Truck Stops Box Trailer Skins , Fuel Tankers , B Double Box Trailers , Plus Spawning into the Traffic Flow only and parked up at random in places are Step Up Vans , Vans , Busses & Isuzu npr Trucks with Real Life Companies & Brands and much more this is the ultimate Realism From The Godfather’s Mods Company can offer with skins on our trailers that will spawn at a state by state only status where u will find something new each state u go to on the ATS map but also u will find skins that will spawn in all parts of the map and map mods as they will be known as Interstate skins. This is The Godfather’s ATS Road Network Mod Pack folks and do note skins in this pack contain Real Life companies from Australia , New Zealand , USA & Europe and do note this pack is only for entertainment use and is a passion of mine folks many hours have been put into this mod and even with the updates that come with it so do enjoy and subscribe to my you tube channel Australia Worldwide Entertainment for gameplay of American Truck Simulator to watch out latest truck & trailer skins that end up going to other mod packs i build.. plus i also do real life truck spotting so u will see daily truck shorts and full length truck spotting videos from my label Don’s Truckspotting Australia via my you tube channel Australia Worldwide Entertainment…
Make shore u take both files inside the downloaded file as its a zip folder when u download so clikc into it and drag what is inside into your ats mods folder then go into the game and turn on the mods make shore they in the ai traffic area in your mods list..
Part 1 of the pack has a total of 750 skins in the pack
Part 2 of the pack has a total of 610 skins in the pack
Grand Total of skins in The Godfather’s ATS Road Network Pack is 1360 skins that spawn at random in the traffic flow and freight market and world of trucks freight market jobs and truck stops and much more..

v1.3 Update (July 2025)
This Update sees a full Rebuild of the mod with the pack been split into 2 parts due to the huge amount of skins in the pack also updates the pack to ATS v1.55 and also brings new States into the pack that spawn skins at random in them states only plus new Interstate skins have been added and a fair few been removed and the 2025 DLC States that have been Released by SCS Software so far have been added in this update with real companies and brands from them states been added with our pack..

USA States that are in The Godfather’s ATS Road Network Pack v1.3
* Arizona (70 Skins)
* Arkansas (60 Skins)
* California (130 Skins)
* Colorado (60 Skins)
* Iowa (70 Skins)
* Interstate Skins (160) The Interstate Skins Spawn in all Parts of the ATS Map and also Map Mods at Random.
* Kansas (60 Skins)
* Missouri (70 Skins)
* Nebraska (70 Skins)
* Nevada (60 Skins)
* New Mexico (80 Skins)
* Oklahoma (70 Skins)
* Oregon (80 Skins)
* Texas (80 skins)
* Utah (90 skins)
* Washington (80 skins)
* Wyoming (70 skins)

Please Subscribe to my You Tube channel Australia Worldwide Entertainment today to watch my latest American Truck Simulator gameplay on PC With every video and Livestream we do showcase my latest skin paintjob designs i build of Real Life Companies and Brands and end up getting Released to you the public in our bundle Mod Packs we Release at Modhub.us & All ATS Mods . net and other ATS Mod Sites that support The Godfather’s Mods Company Mod Packs all 100% free to download all i ask in return is a click to the Subscribe button and enjoy our trucking action we also do Real Life Trucks under my Truck spotting Label Don’s Truckspotting Australia with Daily Truck spotting shorts posted every day and we also do Full Length 4K 60FPS HD Truck Spotting Videos with Interstate and Local Australian and more Trucks with my trips i do around Sydney Australia and other places around Australia with also some of my good mates also sharing the videos with me to post from time to time i welcome the true Truck Fan and Truck spotters and Truck drivers to hop on board and enjoy our great content.
v1.4 Update will come soon folks and will add the rest of the ATS States that are in the game so far in the next update..

Credits: The Godfather's Mods Company EST 2021 Australia Worldwide Entertainment You Tube Channel EST 2018

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Audi A6 C7 2015 3.0 TFSI 1.55x ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 26, 2025

Audi A6 C7 2015 3.0 TFSI 1.55x ETS2

New update:
Fixed Some Materials interior
I added more interior lights
I added a new engine sound

Updated to 1.55x
I added the licence plate
I improved the physics and engine
